entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Increase tags count in TagList for no allocation from 8 to a higher value #83701
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Options.dll has version 7.0.1 at Nuget but downloaded DLL is version 7.0.0.0 #83698
  • Failure when building self-hosted NativeAOT compiler changes with 8.0 Preview 2 SDK #83695
  • [API Proposal]: Add IConfiguration.HasChildren #83692
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime|exception-count metric shows different values after migration from netcore3.1 to net6 #83690
  • MetadataLoadContext: IsValueType: NotSupportedException: Modified types do not support this member #83679
  • runtime-coreclr pgostress: failures with synthetic PGO #83674
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Overwrite MemoryStream #83668
  • Confusing error message. #83667
  • [API Proposal]: A more nuanced story for Dependency Injection #83666
  • Hierarchical ActivityID of ETW events becomes unrelated GUID when iterating over ETL files #83663
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83662
  • Test failure WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite #83659
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/2164/foreground-shutdown/foreground-shutdown.cmd #83658

Closed

  • Handle recursive type graphs in config binding generator #83539
    8.0.0
  • Documentation Comments for IMultiplyOperators`3 mention division. #80521
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging appears to be broken in Chrome 111.0.5563.65 #83452
  • [API Proposal]: Add Marshal.ReadInt128 and Marshal.WriteInt128 methods #83684
    Future
  • SocketsHttpHandler's PooledConnectionLifetime being Infinite on K8s #83665
  • [QUIC] Missing `libmsquic` on tested platforms #81901
    8.0.0
  • JIT: it is difficult to do flow analysis on inlinees #82755
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Missing unsigned check for recent `x < 0` optimization #83653
    8.0.0
  • Results of the Feb 2023 repo survey for dotnet/runtime #83689
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader)' #82729
    8.0.0
  • Regression in BenchmarksGame.SpectralNorm_3.RunBench #79178
    8.0.0
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Generate native/manage stack traces for runtime test crashes #77918
    8.0.0
  • Arm64 macOS uses different sign character on ToString() on a LONG #83671
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace with separate source/destination buffers #81829
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: obj->GetGCSafeMethodTable ()->HasFinalizer () #81504
    8.0.0
  • Mono interpreter performance problems with BitOperations.LeadingZeroCount #38552
    Future
  • More settings for maintaining consistency between AOT and non-AOT mode #82368
    Future
  • Net Framework 4.8: A lot of Async Pinned System.Threading.OverlappedData #83500

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Increment package version for net7 to 7.0.5 #83700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix for issue #78866 and regression test #83697
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correct documentation comment for IMultiplyOperators returns #83693
    community-contribution
  • Bump main pre-release version iteration to preview4 #83691
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add missing OL releases to RID graph #83681
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser] Make JSExport worker thread friendlier #83680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Delete Mono/RuntimeMarshal.cs #83678
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Add arm64 wasm support #83677
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: tolerate malformed IL when counting block successors #83676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add vector horizontal sums on arm64. #83675
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add some barriers to the delegate invoke code. #83673
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use BitOperations::PopCount() in genCountBits() #83661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert "[mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name" #83686
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Handle recursive type graphs in config binding generator #83644
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix a race in gparam construction. #83688
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement support for unspeakable types. #83631
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Reduce the size of some Http header values #83640
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • JIT: revise inlinee block numbering, enable synthesis for inlinees #83610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fix 'x < 0' for unsigned #83656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83511
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix porting from servicing release #83633
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add linux-musl-riscv64 RID #83465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Escape sequence instead of unicode #83595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix ToString handling of [Flags] enums with negative values #83616
  • Delete dead GetUserFeatureDirectory functions #83660
    area-System.IO
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for constant lengths #83638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • get rid of saved_allocated #77197
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Add ability specify core_root when run #82387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Create .devcontainer/devcontainer.json #82639
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #82520
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "[MSBuild]::VersionGreaterThanOrEquals(latest-all, 5.0)" fails on azure devops #31308
  • The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\7.0.4\hostfxr.dll failed #31304

Closed

  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.ios.sdk::16.2.37 is not found in NuGet feeds #31260

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue: 31133 backport pr 30762 to release/7.0.3xx: --platform #31319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31317
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31312
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302

Merged

  • Move RDG omission to ResolveTargetingPackAssets target #31265
    Area-AspNetCore
  • GenAPI should use the latest available codeanalysis workspaces package #31301
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Skip package when resolving package dependencies if it appears multiple times #30105
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generator is not reloaded since SDK 7.0.200 - .NET Host cache issue? #67388
  • Exception in user supplied comparer causes the generator driver to crash #67386
    17.6
  • LSIF generator should have a stable, well-defined set of consumer + customer-facing requirements #67385
  • LSIF generator fails to start because it cannot find the .NET SDK - Near term fix #67383
  • "Implement all members explicitly" adds wrong namespace alias #67374
  • IDE showed an error message saying Semantic Classification Service had crashed #67373
  • Stop silently adding 'using' directives when no auto-completion has been requested #67372
  • Ref-assigning a ref parameter to a ref field with primary constructor #67371
  • [nullable check]'from clause' should have nullable check in query expression #67370

Closed

  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #63746
    Backlog
  • Remove InlineHintsOptions.DisplayAllOverride #57283
    17.6 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test #67387
    Area-IDE
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add NuGet SourceMapping #67382
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 17.5 CI build #67381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce allocations in diagnostic analyzer management system. #67376
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not capture project/solution/compilation data in designer-attribute-scanning. #67369
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change CheckBoxOptionViewModel to AbstractCheckBoxViewModel #67379
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67355
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • revert nuget feed changes #67378
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add new package to PublishData #67375
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update codeowner for O# ExternalAccess #67377
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move off of options for encoding ephemeral state in inline-hints #67367
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unused state form TypeofBinder and GetTypeBinder. #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Update AbstractEditorFactory to implement IVsEditorFactoryChooser #67358
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2139752 #67361
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community, C# 12.0
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Pending director approval, servicing-consider, 17.5
  • Port 66085 to 17.5 for servicing #67300
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval, servicing-consider
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor #47343
  • dotnet watch and Blazor WebAssembly: client makes no attempt to connect to Hot Reload websocket server #47340
  • RDG does not support private parameter and return types #47339
  • RDG does not support generic types from outer scope #47338
  • Unskip grpc template tests on macos 11 #47336
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47330
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47329
  • [SignalR] Server stops sending ping message to the client #47327
  • How to move ClientApp from SPA Project to src/ (root folder) #47326
  • [API Proposal] Ability to monitor circuit activity #47325
  • Asset size limit warnings when building in CodeSpaces #47324
  • Blazor WASM - Scoped Services do not behave like a singleton when used with IHttpClientFactory and DelegatingHandler #47318
  • Static web assets SDK depends on targets defined in Razor SDK #47314
  • API review: Razor MapRazorComponents #47312
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Set default parameter value if provided in RDG #47321
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Build out infrastructure to share behavior tests between RDF and RDG #46196
    8.0-preview3
  • Add parameterless overload for `RequireCors` API #46922
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Exception consistency between RDF and RDG #47311
  • Add Extensions to Http.TypedResults #47050
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Occasional view metadata exception #45900
    Discussions
  • Kestrel webSocket StatusCode cannot be set because the response has already started. #47309
  • [Asp.net core Mvc 7.02] Razor engine file generates (from *.cshtml to *.html) missing associated with a scope identifier for tag helper #47317
  • StateHasChanged blazor issue called using a context menu #47219
  • Blazor app crashes when debugging after updates #47238
  • How to move state from backend to blazor server side #47249
  • Having asp-version in blazor #47305
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #47235
  • Blazor Server using MSI and EFCore #47279
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #47308

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip gRPC template tests on macos 11 until external bug is fixed #47337
    area-mvc
  • Rename M.A.Http.Generators to M.A.Http.RequestDelegateGenerator #47334
    area-runtime
  • Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47328
    area-blazor
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Disable RequestTimeout middleware in SignalR and WebSockets #47342
    feature-websockets, area-signalr, 8.0-preview3
  • Enable Trimming on FileProviders.Embedded #47322
    area-identity, 8.0-preview3
  • Add parameterless RequireCors overload #47341
    area-mvc, area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Show new API project template in VS #47332
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • Apply MIBC optimization data when building ASP.NET composite #47333
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix documentation for `user-jwts create --expires-on` option #47335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • Add src/installers to codeowners #47331
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add TypedResults.Extensions #47285
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • Enable SingleFileAnalyzer #47282
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove RDG Tests that were moved to the base creation tests. #47302
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime
  • JsonSubKeyClaim arrays #46878
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Revised ASP.NET Core module installer for Windows ARM64 #47290
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Adding RedirectUrl option for SpaProxy #47300
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Guidance on using PerfView/other perf visualization tools. #2911
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-counter doesn't display UpDownCounter #3742
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-counters doesn't display a counter until the app records a measurement #3743
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-counters should display counters as absolute values and not count per second #3751
    8.0.0
  • Epic: .NET Developers have a great observability & diagnostics experience for cloud-native applications #3756
    8.0.0
  • Provide more control over when a complete (blind) load of all symbols occurs #3737
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove GCRootImpl - reimplement commands in C# #3766

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Resizetizer 'file is being used by another process' error when referencing a .NET MAUI App from another .NET MAUI App #14082
  • ViewCellRenderer Issues #14079
  • Frame clipping incorrectly on Windows #14078
    Backlog
  • ListView rows not visible on Windows when using CommandParameter #14065
    Backlog
  • [Android and iOS] Keyboard is not dismissed after entering text and tapping Search button in MAUI "SearchBar" control #14061
    Backlog
  • RefreshView TapGestureRecognizer Event does not respond on iOs for items which are only visible after scrolling #14060
  • When using Frame to wrap CollectionView, the bound data is not displayed under certain operations. #14059
    Backlog

Closed

  • RadioButton with ControlTemplate in a Grid can't change from invisible to visible #8482
  • RadioButton crash on Windows #11049
    Backlog
  • Images are lost after receiving push notifications #14064
  • Changing App icon prevents compiler from building successfully #13839
  • LayoutOptions.Fill does not work with VisualElement.MaximumWidthRequest in FlexLayout #14050
  • Border does not grow when editor inside it grows #7524
    Backlog
  • Every MAUI Page generates a Memory Leak on iOS and macCatalyst #13520
    Backlog
  • SearchBar does not unfocus and hide keyboard on iOS #11542
    Backlog
  • Frame Error display on Android devices #13469
    Backlog
  • Text is clipped in SwipeItem #11495
    Backlog
  • Listview Footer content doesn't appears #13560
    Backlog
  • Minimize/Maximize/Close button on the right corner of header of window is not working #8827
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI macOS target publishing/archiving #5399
    Backlog
  • [MAC-CATALYST] Presses methods not triggered for input keys in Entry #9838
    Backlog
  • TableSection TextColor NullReferenceException in Mac #14027
    Backlog
  • Unable to add icon to Tabbed page #13826

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump to .NET 8 Preview 3 builds #14081
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [core] WeakEventManager.RemoveEventHandler() should clear subscriptions #14074
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] fix memory leak in `Window` (#13400) #14073
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #14071
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #14070
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #14069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#13908) #14067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event (#11199) #14076
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) (#11200) #14072
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [windows] fix memory leak when `CollectionView.ItemsSource` changes #14075
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event (#11199) #14077
  • [Android] Avoid to clip the SwipeView to the outline if the SwipeView or the Content has shadow #14024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager (#13689) #14068
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory leak when using a shared CancellationTokenSource #30534
  • Q: EF Core Connection resiliency ignore queries in transactions. #30533
  • ef dbcontext scaffold pass argument file to avoid argument limit exceeded errors #30532
  • InvalidOperationException when calling ExecuteUpdate with owned entity & using current value #30528
  • add-migration to detect tabs/spaces preference from .editorconfig #30527

Closed

  • Changing Default Column Order #30529
  • Migration bundles does not work in the context of MySQL database and CICD pipeline in Github Action #30514
  • Configure computed database property values using expressions #30496
  • Add trigger support in EF Core. #30455
  • Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 6.0.8 was not found. An approximate best match of Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 7.0.1 was resolved. #30444
  • Retrive shadow properties with Notrack #30438
  • I can't perform a Migration #30437
  • model.GetEntityTypes() is empty inside overridden Generate method with DropTableOperation of custom SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30318
  • ef migrations bundle --output {PATH} fails if directory chain for PATH does not exist. #30123
    8.0.0
  • Query: JSON collection issues incorrect warning CompositeKeyWithValueGeneration #30516
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.1 to 3.32.2 #30536
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • API review changes #30526

Merged

  • Create directory chain if doesn't exist for ef migrations bundle #30392
  • Fix to #30516 - Query: JSON collection issues incorrect warning CompositeKeyWithValueGeneration #30517

Updated

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • During installation of SDK 8.0 P2, workload baseline manifests are still P1 #15804

PullRequests

Created

  • PVP workaround for system.drawing.common removal #15876
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15874
  • Allow disabling full signing in source-build #15873
  • Update SB version info for 8.0 Preview 2 release #15872
  • Add source-build online stage2 CI leg #15870

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15857
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15871
  • Update MAUI baseline manifests #15867
  • Publish checksums #15803
  • Add System.Common.Drawing prebuilt #15868
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add patch to address emsdk prebuilts #15866
    Area-SourceBuild
